metadata.title: CVE-2021-3497 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
GStreamer before 1.18.4 might access already-freed memory in error codepaths when demuxing certain malformed Matroska files.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-3497` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gstreamer1.0-gtk3 - 1.16.2-1ubuntu2.1
gstreamer1.0-plugins-good - 1.16.2-1ubuntu2.1
gstreamer1.0-pulseaudio - 1.16.2-1ubuntu2.1
gstreamer1.0-qt5 - 1.16.2-1ubuntu2.1
libgstreamer-plugins-good1.0-0 - 1.16.2-1ubuntu2.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gst-plugins-good1.0 package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.16.2-1ubuntu2.1').
